block.p: An article yesterday about a Washington lobbying company, Podesta.com, in which two partners have brothers in high positions in the Clinton White House, referred incorrectly to Heather Barbour's connection with the company. She is no longer there, having left at the end of July for a job in California. And she is not a daughter (or other relative) of Haley Barbour, former chairman of the Republican Party.
